item.title: Three-day Krishi Mela begins in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[The three-day Krishi Mela kicked off at the University of Agriculture Sciences (UAS) in Raichur on Saturday.
Shivakumar Swami of Kappatagudda Nandiveri Samsthan mutt in Mundaragi in Gadag district inaugurated the Mela organised by the UAS, Agriculture, and related departments.
â€œAgriculture was an ancient and prime profession for lakhs of farmers in India. But, after years passing, many of this generation are not showing interest in agriculture owing to different reasons, including climate chan...]]>
